title: Generalized WDVV equations for F4 pure N=2 Super-Yang-Mills theory
abstract: An associative algebra of holomorphic differential forms is constructed associated with pure N=2 Super-Yang-Mills theory for the Lie algebra F4. Existence and associativity of this algebra, combined with the general arguments in the work of Marshakov, Mironov and Morozov, proves that the prepotential of this theory satisfies the generalized WDVV system.
